name: part_010
file: tmp_【NO DOWN TIME!!】Mori Calliope 3D Birthday Live 2024 #NODOWNTIME2024 [sdzbH7LX80w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope introduces the Suicide Squad Isekai PV.
Promotional Video for the anime "Suicide Squad Isekai".
Mori Calliope shares her excitement about singing the ending theme for "Suicide Squad Isekai".
Teaser for a new song release coming on April 25, 2024.
Mori Calliope talks about her new merch and prepares for the final song.
Beginning of the final song performance, "ROKI".

subtitles.original: Yahoo!
subtitles.english: Yahoo!

subtitles.original: ハーレイ・クインか...
subtitles.english: Harley Quinn...

subtitles.original: ゴッサム・シティの犯罪王、ジョーカーのパートナー。
subtitles.english: Accomplice to The Joker, known as the Gotham City's Clown Prince of Crime

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃん、プリンちゃん！
subtitles.english: Oh that's perfect, Puddin'!

subtitles.original: こんなのは長い長いショーの導入だ。
subtitles.english: This is just a long introduction to the show.

subtitles.original: 今の世界は醜く、
subtitles.english: The world we know is so hideous and...

subtitles.original: 何より...不公平だ。
subtitles.english: above of all, unfair.

subtitles.original: A world connected by the "Gate"
subtitles.english: A world connected by the "Gate"

subtitles.original: Get down!
subtitles.english: Get down!

subtitles.original: あなたたち5人には、ある任務についてもらう。
subtitles.english: The five of you will be assigned a mission.

subtitles.original: The Super-Villains are sent to ISEKAI
subtitles.english: The Super-Villains are sent to ISEKAI

subtitles.original: 任務？
subtitles.english: A mission?

subtitles.original: 平和のための任務だ。
subtitles.english: A peace-keeping mission.

subtitles.original: 平和？俺たちが？
subtitles.english: Us? Peace?

subtitles.original: キャスティングを誤ったな。
subtitles.english: They've made casting errors for sure.

subtitles.original: 最恐！
subtitles.english: Take that!

subtitles.original: イカれてやがる。
subtitles.english: She's nuts.

subtitles.original: 俺、頑張る。
subtitles.english: Do my best, me.

subtitles.original: 我々王国と帝国の戦争は、すでに数十年に及んでいる。
subtitles.english: The war between our kingdom and the Empire has been going on for decades.

subtitles.original: どうすればこの軍勢を止められる？
subtitles.english: How do we defeat their troops?

subtitles.original: 俺たちが出向き戦えば、瞬く間に平和になる！
subtitles.english: If we go out and fight, there will be peace in an instant!

subtitles.original: この方たちを信じてみても良いのではないかと。
subtitles.english: I think we should trust them.

subtitles.original: 何？チラチラ見てたよね、アタシのこと。
subtitles.english: Hey, you were eyeing me earlier

subtitles.original: とにかく今は、この国と有効関係を結ぶことが先決だ。
subtitles.english: We need to establish a friendly relationship with them first.

subtitles.original: この戦争を終わらせようではないか！
subtitles.english: Let us put an end to this war!

subtitles.original: ひとまず憂さ晴らしに、帝国の奴らをぶっ潰す。
subtitles.english: I will knock 'em out to blow off steam.

subtitles.original: じゃ、始めちゃう？
subtitles.english: So, shall we kick it off?

subtitles.english: Ending Theme "Go-Getters" by Mori Calliope

subtitles.english: Don't worry, puddin'

subtitles.english: I will come back to you...

subtitles.english: So, I have been chosen to sing the ending theme

subtitles.original: for the TV anime, Suicide Squad Isekai,

subtitles.english: to air from July.

subtitles.english: I'm so excited about this. I waited so long to tell you guys about it.

subtitles.english: And I know I already did tell you about it,

subtitles.english: but even saying it now, it feels like a dream.

subtitles.english: one of my goals was to make a song for anime.
